articles.title: Diplomatic corps  visits Oun Revolutionary  Site
Respectful homage paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Diplomatic corps  visits Oun Revolutionary  Site
    Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The diplomatic corps here  on April 22 visited the Oun Revolutionary Site in a suburb of Pyongyang to mark the 67th anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army.   The revolutionary site is a camping ground where General Secretary Kim Jong Il had a military training in the summer of 1962.   The visitors, hearing the story about happenings during the military training, looked round historical data, buildings and places of training.

articles.title: Korean art troupe from Japan feted
articles.content:
Respectful homage paid to Kim Il Sung
    Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Indonesian ambassador Buchari Effendi and embassy officials in the DPRK visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Thursday in which the President Kim Il Sung lies in state and paid tribute to him on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries.   After expressing respects to the statue of the President, they paid respectful homage to him, who lies in state.   They looked round with deep attention orders and medals which foreign states awarded to the President and his relics.

Gift to Kim Jong Il from Syrian friendship delegation
   Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the visiting friendship delegation of Army and Armed Forces of the Syrian Arab Republic, led by Lieut. General Farouk Issa Ibrahim, deputy chief of the general staff of its army and armed forces. He  handed it to an official concerned.

articles.content:
"Minister of National Defense" incites confrontation with north
   Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Chon Yong Thaek, "Minister of National Defense" of South Korea, reportedly reiterated confrontation and war against the north, at the 3rd field army command of the South Korean Army and the 2nd division of the marine corps on April 21.   Chon slandered the north, talking about "provocative infiltration into the south" by the north,  "perfect preparedness" and "guard over coasts."   His remarks stemmed from  a sinister attempt to incite antagonism against and confrontation with the north, dampen the desire of all the  fellow countrymen for reunification and avoid the South Korean people's criticism of the "government."

articles.title: Significant day of rebirth
articles.content:
Sweden-Korea Friendship Association meets
   Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association was held in Stockholm on April 17.   The meeting reviewed the work of the association for 1998 and discussed a working plan for 1999.   It made a point of fully supporting the just cause of the Korean people who, under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, work hard for the  reunification of the country, socialist construction and liquidation of the aftermath of natural disasters, defying the imperialist campaign to isolate and stifle them.
